key_risks: Environmental impact due to high greenhouse gas emissions
Market volatility and cyclical demand in the steel industry
Dependence on global economic conditions and trade policies
controversies: Ongoing regulatory and societal pressure to reduce carbon footprint
Financial losses reported in recent quarters due to market challenges
environmental_issues: Significant greenhouse gas emissions from steel production
social_issues: Impact of operational disruptions on local communities
governance_issues: Complex and costly transition to electric arc furnace technology
Dependence on raw material suppliers and supply chain risks

sources.title: Algoma Steel Issues 2024 ESG Annual Report | Algoma Steel Inc.
sources.snippet: SAULT STE. MARIE, Ontario, Aug. 12, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Algoma Steel Group Inc. (NASDAQ: ASTL; TSX: ASTL) ("Algoma" or "the Company"), a leading Canadian producer of hot and cold rolled steel sheet and plate products, today announced the publication of its second annual Environmental, Social, and Governance ("ESG") report (the "Report").
